title: Social Media-Based Political Knowledge Acquisition Online Course

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding basic political systems and experience with social media usage
context.additional_context: Course to strengthen political knowledge acquisition skills via social media for current mathematics practitioners. Incorporates LMS-based discussion activities and considers smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners improve their ability to critically evaluate politically related information across various social media platforms.
Learners acquire skills in analyzing political issues and logical communication through participation in online discussions.
Learners apply systematic methods for organizing and utilizing politically related information collected from social media.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
